title: Val Kilmer Voiced One Of TV's Most Famous AI Characters
description: The late Val Kilmer once replaced Will Arnett and lent his voice to one of the most famous artificial intelligence characters to ever hit the small screen.
content: Glen A. Larson's 1982 action series "Knight Rider" was about a police detective named Michael Long who barely survives a gunshot wound to the face. Long is rescued by an eccentric billionaire named Wilton Knight (Richard Baseheart) and given extensiv... [3567 chars]

title: AI can spot which patients need treatment to prevent vision loss in young adults
description: Researchers have successfully used artificial intelligence (AI) to predict which patients need treatment to stabilize their corneas and preserve their eyesight, in a study presented at the 43rd Congress of the European Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgeons (ESCRS).

title: Nvidia researchers call SLMs the future of AI: Here's why
description: Experts at Nvidia claim that Small Language Models (SLMs) are key to the future of the artificial intelligence (AI) sector.
content:
Experts at Nvidia claim that Small Language Models (SLMs) are key to the future of the artificial intelligence (AI) sector.

title: AI shakes up call center industry, but some tasks are still better left to the humans
description: Armen Kirakosian remembers the frustrations of his first job as a call center agent nearly 10 years ago: the aggravated customers, the constant searching through menus for information and the notes he had to physically write for each call he handled. title: AI is opening a MAGA-Trump split
description: Trump's White House is all-in on building powerful American artificial intelligence. The populist base is starting to push back.
content:
Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) fired off a tirade on X, complaining that AI could create mass poverty by replacing human jobs, and giant AI data centers could have potentially devastating effects on the environment and water supply.

title: ASML invests $1.5 billion in French startup Mistral AI to strengthen artificial intelligence use in chip development
description: ASML plans to apply advanced AI to its chip research
content:
ASML invests €1.3 billion in French startup Mistral AI, securing an 11 percent stake
Partnership will apply AI to ASML’s research development and lithography system operations

title: Proposals for AI solutions invited under Kerala AI initiative
description: The Kerala State IT Mission, in collaboration with the Kerala Startup Mission (KSUM), has invited artificial intelligence (AI) solutions that address real-world governance challenges identified by various departments under the ‘K-AI Initiative: AI for Governance’ programme.
